mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_spaces (spc_name, spc_cap, spc_image, spc_explain, cop_seq, rsc_seq) VALUES (#{spcName}, #{spcCap}, #{spcImage}, #{spcExplain}, #{copSeq}, #{rscSeq});
mapper.select: SELECT spc_seq, spc_name, spc_cap, spc_image, spc_explain FROM tb_spaces WHERE spc_seq = #{spcSeq};
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_spaces SET spc_name = #{spcName}, spc_cap = #{spcCap}, spc_image = #{spcImage}, spc_explain = #{spcExplain} WHERE spc_seq = #{spcSeq};
